languages.text: "Если быть откровенным, у меня есть... некоторые опасения касательно Ульфара. Бесспорно, он — один из {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Астартес{/g}, божественных воинов Императора, и его помощь будет неоценима в наших попытках убраться из Комморры. Однако... Космические волки — весьма специфический Орден. Я не могу рассказать тебе все... нюансы, не нарушив запреты {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиции{/g}, однако прошу тебя — будь осторожнее в обращении с этим воителем".

traits.locale_text: "Если быть откровенным, у меня есть... некоторые опасения касательно Ульфара. Бесспорно, он — один из {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Астартес{/g}, божественных воинов Императора, и его помощь будет неоценима в наших попытках убраться их Комморры. Однако... Космические Волки — весьма специфический легион. Я не могу рассказать тебе все... нюансы, не нарушив запреты {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиции{/g}, однако прошу тебя — будь осторожнее в обращении с этим воителем".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "If I may be candid, I have certain... reservations about Ulfar. There is no question that he is one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Astartes{/g}, the divine warriors of the Emperor, and his help will be invaluable in our attempts to escape Commorragh. However, as Chapters go, the Space Wolves are extremely... distinctive. I can't reveal all that I know without breaking the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}, but I'm asking you — be careful when dealing with the warrior."
languages.original_text: "Если быть откровенным, у меня есть... некоторые опасения касательно Ульфара. Бесспорно, он — один из {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Астартес{/g}, божественных воинов Императора, и его помощь будет неоценима в наших попытках убраться из Комморры. Однако... Космические волки — весьма специфический Орден. Я не могу рассказать тебе все... нюансы, не нарушив запреты {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Инквизиции{/g}, однако прошу тебя — будь осторожнее в обращении с этим воителем".

traits.locale_text: "If I may be candid, I have certain... reservations about Ulfar. There is no question that he is one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Astartes{/g}, the divine warriors of the Emperor, and his help will be invaluable in our attempts to escape Commorragh. However, as Chapters go, the Space Wolves are extremely... distinctive. I can't reveal all that I know without breaking the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}, but I'm asking you — be careful when dealing with the warrior."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “如果允许我坦白的话，我确实对乌尔法……有所保留。毫无疑问，他是一位{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}阿斯塔特修士{/g}，是帝皇的神圣战士。如果他可以在逃离科摩罗的过程中帮助我们，那他的协助将会是无价之宝。然而，身为星际战士，太空野狼实在是过于……特立独行。如果我向你透露我所知道的一切，恐怕就要违反{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}的禁令了。不过我请求你，和乌尔法打交道的时候，一定要当心。”
languages.original_text: "If I may be candid, I have certain... reservations about Ulfar. There is no question that he is one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Astartes{/g}, the divine warriors of the Emperor, and his help will be invaluable in our attempts to escape Commorragh. However, as Chapters go, the Space Wolves are extremely... distinctive. I can't reveal all that I know without breaking the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}, but I'm asking you — be careful when dealing with the warrior."

traits.locale_text: “如果允许我坦白的话，我确实对乌尔法……有所保留。毫无疑问，他是一位{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}阿斯塔特修士{/g}，是帝皇的神圣战士。如果他可以在逃离科摩罗的过程中帮助我们，那他的协助将会是无价之宝。然而，身为星际战士，太空野狼实在是过于……特立独行。如果我向你透露我所知道的一切，恐怕就要违反{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}审判庭{/g}的禁令了。不过我请求你，和乌尔法打交道的时候，一定要当心。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "If I may be candid, I have certain... reservations about Ulfar. There is no question that he is one of the Astartes, the divine warriors of the Emperor, and his help will be invaluable in our attempts to escape Commorragh. However, as Chapters go, the Space Wolves are extremely... distinctive. I can't reveal all that I know without breaking the prohibitions of the Inquisition, but I'm asking you — be careful when dealing with the warrior."

languages.text: «Si me permite la franqueza, tengo ciertas... reservas sobre Ulfar. No cabe duda de que es uno de los {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Astartes{/g}, los guerreros divinos del Emperador, y su ayuda será vital para escapar de Commorragh. No obstante, en lo que a capítulos se refiere, los Lobos Espaciales son extremadamente... peculiares. No puedo revelar todo lo que sé sin quebrantar las prohibiciones de la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisición{/g}, pero quiero pedirle que tenga cuidado al tratar con él».
languages.original_text: "If I may be candid, I have certain... reservations about Ulfar. There is no question that he is one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Astartes{/g}, the divine warriors of the Emperor, and his help will be invaluable in our attempts to escape Commorragh. However, as Chapters go, the Space Wolves are extremely... distinctive. I can't reveal all that I know without breaking the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}, but I'm asking you — be careful when dealing with the warrior."

traits.locale_text: «Si me permite la franqueza, tengo ciertas... reservas sobre Ulfar. No cabe duda de que es uno de los {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Astartes{/g}, los guerreros divinos del Emperador, y su ayuda será vital para escapar de Commorragh. No obstante, en lo que a legiones se refiere, los Lobos Espaciales son extremadamente... peculiares. No puedo revelar todo lo que sé sin quebrantar las prohibiciones de la {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisición{/g}, pero quiero pedirle que tenga cuidado al tratar con él».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「率直に言わせてもらえば…ウルファーには疑念が在る。彼が皇帝の聖なる戦士である{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}アスタルテス{/g}の1人であることは間違いない。そしてコモラフからの脱出には、彼の協力が不可欠だ。だが戦団の中でも、スペースウルフは極めて…異質なのだ。{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}異端審問庁{/g}の禁則事項があるかぎり、すべてを話すことはできない。だが、あの戦士の対応には注意するのだ」
languages.original_text: "If I may be candid, I have certain... reservations about Ulfar. There is no question that he is one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Astartes{/g}, the divine warriors of the Emperor, and his help will be invaluable in our attempts to escape Commorragh. However, as Chapters go, the Space Wolves are extremely... distinctive. I can't reveal all that I know without breaking the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}, but I'm asking you — be careful when dealing with the warrior."

traits.locale_text: 「率直に言わせてもらえば…ウルファーには疑念が在る。彼が皇帝の聖なる戦士である{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}アスタルテス{/g}の1人であることは間違いない。そしてコモラフからの脱出には、彼の協力が不可欠だ。だが戦団の中でも、スペースウルフは極めて…異質なのだ。{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}異端審問庁{/g}の禁則事項があるかぎり、すべてを話すことはできない。だが、あの戦士の対応には注意するのだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Wenn ich ganz offen sprechen darf, ich habe gewisse ... Vorbehalte, was Ulfar angeht. Es steht außer Frage, dass er ein {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Astartes{/g} ist, einer der göttlichen Krieger des Imperators, und dass seine Hilfe bei unseren Bemühungen, aus Commorragh zu entkommen, unschätzbar wertvoll sein wird. Doch die Space Wolves sind unter allen Orden ... einzigartig. Ich kann nicht alles preisgeben, was ich weiß, ohne die Verbote der {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} zu brechen, doch ich bitte Euch – seid vorsichtig im Umgang mit dem Krieger."
languages.original_text: "If I may be candid, I have certain... reservations about Ulfar. There is no question that he is one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Astartes{/g}, the divine warriors of the Emperor, and his help will be invaluable in our attempts to escape Commorragh. However, as Chapters go, the Space Wolves are extremely... distinctive. I can't reveal all that I know without breaking the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}, but I'm asking you — be careful when dealing with the warrior."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn ich ganz offen sprechen darf, ich habe gewisse ... Vorbehalte, was Ulfar angeht. Es steht außer Frage, dass er ein {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Astartes{/g} ist, einer der göttlichen Krieger des Imperators, und dass seine Hilfe bei unseren Bemühungen, aus Commorragh zu entkommen, unschätzbar wertvoll sein wird. Doch die Space Wolves sind unter allen Legionen ... einzigartig. Ich kann nicht alles preisgeben, was ich weiß, ohne die Verbote der {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g} zu brechen, doch ich bitte Euch — seid vorsichtig im Umgang mit dem Krieger."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Pour être franc, j'ai quelques... réserves à propos d'Ulfar. Je ne doute pas une seconde qu'il fasse partie de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Astartes{/g}, les guerriers divins de l'Empereur, et que son aide nous soit indispensable pour nous échapper de Commorragh. Cela dit, les Space Wolves sont... une espèce à part, dirons-nous. Je ne peux malheureusement pas tout vous dire sans briser l'interdit de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}, mais je vous en prie, restez sur vos gardes lorsque vous traitez avec ce guerrier. »
languages.original_text: "If I may be candid, I have certain... reservations about Ulfar. There is no question that he is one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Astartes{/g}, the divine warriors of the Emperor, and his help will be invaluable in our attempts to escape Commorragh. However, as Chapters go, the Space Wolves are extremely... distinctive. I can't reveal all that I know without breaking the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}, but I'm asking you — be careful when dealing with the warrior."

traits.locale_text: « Pour être franc, j'ai quelques... réserves à propos d'Ulfar. Je ne doute pas une seconde qu'il fasse partie de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Astartes{/g}, les guerriers divins de l'Empereur, et que son aide nous soit indispensable pour nous échapper de Commorragh. Cela dit, les Space Wolves sont... une espèce à part, dirons-nous. Je ne peux malheureusement pas tout vous dire sans briser l'interdit de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}, mais je vous en prie, restez sur vos gardes lorsque vous traitez avec ce guerrier. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Açık konuşmam gerekirse... Ulfar'a dair birtakım çekincelerim var. İmparator'un ilahi savaşçılarından, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Astartes'ten{/g} olduğu şüphesiz. Commorragh'dan kaçışımızda muhakkak büyük yardımı da olacaktır. Ancak Tümenler içinden... Uzay Kurtları'ndan oluşu son derece manidar. Tüm bildiklerimi aktaramıyorum. {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Engizisyon{/g} yasağı var, malum. Yine de rica ediyorum, bu savaşçıya dikkat et."
languages.original_text: "If I may be candid, I have certain... reservations about Ulfar. There is no question that he is one of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Astartes{/g}, the divine warriors of the Emperor, and his help will be invaluable in our attempts to escape Commorragh. However, as Chapters go, the Space Wolves are extremely... distinctive. I can't reveal all that I know without breaking the prohibitions of the {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Inquisition{/g}, but I'm asking you — be careful when dealing with the warrior."

traits.locale_text: "Açık konuşmam gerekirse... Ulfar'a dair birtakım çekincelerim var. İmparator'un ilahî savaşçılarından, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAstartes}Astartes{/g}'ten olduğu şüphesiz. Commorragh'dan kaçışımızda muhakkak büyük yardımı da olacaktır. Ancak Tümenler içinden... Uzay Kurtları'ndan oluşu son derece manidar. Tüm bildiklerimi aktaramıyorum. {g|Encyclopedia:Inquisition}Engizisyon{/g} yasağı var, malum. Yine de rica ediyorum, bu savaşçıya dikkat et."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
